This effect lasts for 15 seconds +2 per Caster Level.

Spell.Name: Ice Chill Poison Imbue
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Coat your weapon in a magical poison that saps the speed from your enemies on contact. On Hit: -1 Reflex Save per stack, stacks 3 times. On Crit: 1d6 Dexterity Damage. An item can have only one temporary item enhancement at a time.

Spell.Name: Sanctified Vial
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Ceruleite Casting this spell requires levels in Cleric, Paladin, or Favored Soul, or for you to be in a Devine Epic Destiny. Throw a bottle that splashes Holy Water when it breaks, dealing 1d4+4 Bane Damage per Caster Level to Undead and Extraplanar creatures nearby. (This damage scales with Force Spell Power). The Holy Water will attempt to force all extraplanar creatures in the bottle's splash back to their home plane with the effect of the Banishment spell. A successful Will save negates this effect. (DC = spell's save DC - creature's Hit Dice or Level + your caster level).

Spell.Name: Smoke Bomb
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Gildleaf Throw a bottle beneath you that explodes into a clod of smoke and leaves you Invisible and Displaced for 12 seconds.

Spell.Name: Soulshatter Poison Imbue
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Coat your weapon in a magical poison that saps the willpower from your enemies on contact. On Hit: -1 Will Save per stack, stacks 3 times. On Crit: 1d6 Wisdom Damage. An item can have only one temporary item enhancement at a time.

Spell.Name: Stoneskin Potion
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Ceruleite Turn your skin to durable stone. Gain a resistance to physical damage of 10/Adamantine for the duration. Once this potion has prevented 10 points of damage per caster level, it is discharged

Spell.Name: Vein Freeze
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Gildleaf Throw a bottle at a targetted foe that explodes, dealing 5 to 10 Cold damage per Caster Level, and slowes enemies caught within. Some enemies may be required to make a Fortitude save to be Frozen for 12 seconds. DND Dice: Deals 1d6+4 Cold damage per caster level, max 20d6+80. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half and negates the debuff.

Spell.Name: Voidmind Poison Imbue
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Coat your weapon in a magical poison that saps the defenses from your enemies on contact. On Hit: -1 Spell Resistance per stack, stacks 3 times. On Crit: 1d6 Intelligence Damage. An item can have only one temporary item enhancement at a time.

Spell.Name: Voltaic Burst
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Gildleaf Throw a bottle at a targetted foe that explodes, dealing 5 to 10 Electric damage per Caster Level to enemies caught in the blast. In addition, enemies must make a Fortitude saving throw or take -5 Magical Resistance Rating for 12 seconds. DND Dice: Deals 1d6+4 Electric damage per caster level, max 20d6+80. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half and negates the debuff.

Spell.Name: Bottled Boost: Haste
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Ceruleite Drink a potion with the effects of Action Boost: Haste. You gain a +30% Action Boost Bonus to Attack speed for 20 seconds. In addition to this spell's normal cooldown, this spell puts all Action Boosts and Bottled Boost spells on a 30 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Flashbang
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Gildleaf Lob a vial that explodes on impact. Nearby enemies must make a Fortitude save or be blinded. If they fail this save and are already blinded, they instead will be stunned.

Spell.Name: Flesh to Gold, Mass
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Gildleaf Enemies around you must make a Fortitude saving throw or be turned to gold. Creatures made of flesh that fail a Fortitude save are turned to metallic, helpless statues with minor resistance to piercing damage. This lasts 30 seconds plus 12 seconds per caster level, but the target has a chance to remake its fortitude save every 12 seconds.

Spell.Name: Greater Elemental Weapons
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Your target's currently equipped weapons gain Hit Effect: 3 to 18 elemental damage of your choice. An item can only have one temporary item enchantment at a time. +2 Alchemical bonus to Imbue dice.

Spell.Name: Greater Evolution
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Ceruleite Multi selector: Grant +4 Alchemical Bonus to your select ability score. You may only have one Alchemical Mutation at a time. This lasts for 1 minute per Caster Level

Stance.Name: StrEvolution
Stance.Description: Your Lesser/Standard/Greater Evolution spell applies to Strength

Stance.Name: IntEvolution
Stance.Description: Your Lesser/Standard/Greater Evolution spell applies to Intelligence

Stance.Name: WisEvolution
Stance.Description: Your Lesser/Standard/Greater Evolution spell applies to Wisdom

Stance.Name: DexEvolution
Stance.Description: Your Lesser/Standard/Greater Evolution spell applies to Dexterity

Stance.Name: ConEvolution
Stance.Description: Your Lesser/Standard/Greater Evolution spell applies to Constitution

Stance.Name: ChaEvolution
Stance.Description: Your Lesser/Standard/Greater Evolution spell applies to Charisma

Spell.Name: Greater Stoneskin
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Ceruleite Turn your skin to durable and magical stone. Gain a resistance to physical damage of 20/Adamantine for the duration. Once this potion has prevented 20 points of damage per caster level, it is discharged

Spell.Name: Multivial of Acid
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Conjuring many bottles of caustic liquid, you throw 4 projectiles that explode on impact, with each dealing 2 to 7 Acid damage per caster level to all nearby foes, max caster level 20. DND Dice: Deals 1d4+3 Acid damage per caster level per projectile, max 10d4+30. A successful Reflex save reduces this damage by half. Shares a cooldown with all other Multivial spells.

Spell.Name: Multivial of Flame
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Conjuring many bottles of burning liquid, you throw 4 projectiles that explode on impact, with each dealing 2 to 7 Fire damage per caster level to all nearby foes, max caster level 20. DND Dice: Deals 1d4+3 Fire damage per caster level per projectile, max 10d4+30. A successful Reflex save reduces this damage by half. Shares a cooldown with all other Multivial spells.

Spell.Name: Multivial of Frost
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Conjuring many bottles of freezing liquid, you throw 4 projectiles that explode on impact, with each dealing 2 to 7 Cold damage per caster level to all nearby foes, max caster level 20. DND Dice: Deals 1d4+3 Cold damage per caster level per projectile, max 10d4+30. A successful Reflex save reduces this damage by half. Shares a cooldown with all other Multivial spells.

Spell.Name: Multivial of Poison
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Conjuring many bottles of poisonous material, you throw 4 projectiles that explode on impact, with each dealing 2 to 7 poison damage per caster level to all nearby foes, max caster level 20. DND Dice: Deals 1d4+3 poison damage per caster level per projectile, max 10d4+30. A successful Reflex save reduces this damage by half. Shares a cooldown with all other Multivial spells.

Spell.Name: Multivial of Sparks
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Conjuring many bottles of reactive material, you throw 4 projectiles that explode on impact, with each dealing 2 to 7 Electric damage per caster level to all nearby foes, max caster level 20. DND Dice: Deals 1d4+3 Electric damage per caster level per projectile, max 10d4+30. A successful Reflex save reduces this damage by half. Shares a cooldown with all other Multivial spells.

Spell.Name: Poison Breath
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite You exhale poison through your mouth in a large cone, causing enemies caught within the area to take 6 to 11 Poison damage per caster level, max caster level 20. This is a breathe attack. This poison will leave enemies Contaminated. DND Dice: Deals 1d6+5 Poison damage per caster level, max 20d6+100 Poison damage. A successful Fortitude save reduces the damage by half.

Spell.Name: Turn to Frog
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Throw a vial at a single enemy, who must succeed a Fortitude saving throw or be turned into a frog.

Spell.Name: Curative Admixture: Harm
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Gildleaf Infuses a Harm potion with magical energy, hurling it towards your target in an arc. This channels powerful negaive energy into targets to wipe away injury and afflictions, restore 10 hit points per caster level (up to a max of 150 hit points at caster level 15), and remove ability damage and conditions blinded, confused, dazed, dazzled, deafened, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, feebleminded, insanity, nauseated and poisoned. Against undead this spell acts as Heal. Undead who make a successful Will save reduce the damage by half. DND Dice: Harms 10 hp per caster level (max 150). This spell receives reduced benefit from spell power.

Spell.Name: Curative Admixture: Heal
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Gildleaf Infuses a Heal potion with magical energy, hurling it towards your target in an arc. This channels powerful positive energy into targets to wipe away injury and afflictions, restore 10 hit points per caster level (up to a max of 150 hit points at caster level 15), and remove ability damage and conditions blinded, confused, dazed, dazzled, deafened, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, feebleminded, insanity, nauseated and poisoned. Against undead this spell acts as Harm. Undead who make a successful Will save reduce the damage by half. DND Dice: Heals 10 hp per caster level (max 150). This spell receives reduced benefit from spell power.

Spell.Name: Dust of Confusion
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Ceruleite Scatter dust around you that causes enemies around you to begin to vividly hallucinate. On a failed Will save, they become Confused, attacking and able to be attacked by friend and foe alike. This effect lasts for 15 seconds +2 per Caster Level, and enemies make a recurring save once every 24 seconds.

Spell.Name: Elemental Combination
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Throw a single bottle of a volatile magical concoction that deals an intense combination of Poison, Fire, Cold, Acid, and Electric damage, chosen randomly each time. DND DIce: Deals: 1d6+3 damage of a random 3 selections among Poison, Fire, Cold, Acid and Electric damage per caster level, max 20d6+60 per element. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half.

Spell.Name: Gold Breath
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite You exhale gold though your mouth in a large cone, causing enemies caught within the area to take 1d4+2 Fire and 1d4+2 Bludgeon damage per caster level, max caster level 20. This is Breath attack. A successful Fortitude save reduces the damage by half.

Spell.Name: Goldskin Potion
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Ceruleite Turn your skin to metallic, magical gold. Gain a resistance to physical damage of 30/Adamantine for the duration. Once this potion has prevented 30 points of damage per caster level, it is discharged

Spell.Name: Greater Heartseeker Poison Imbue
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Coat your weapon in a magical poison that saps the fortitude from your enemies on contact. On Hit: -1 Fort Save per stack, stacks 3 times. On Crit: 1d6 Constitution Damage. On Vorpal: 1 stack of Vulnerability An item can have only one temporary item enhancement at a time.

Spell.Name: Greater Ice Chill Poison Imbue
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Coat your weapon in a magical poison that saps the speed from your enemies on contact. On Hit: -1 Reflex Save per stack, stacks 3 times. On Crit: 1d6 Dexterity Damage. On Vorpal: 1 stack of Vulnerability An item can have only one temporary item enhancement at a time.

Spell.Name: Greater Soulshatter Poison Imbue
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Coat your weapon in a magical poison that saps the willpower from your enemies on contact. On Hit: -1 Will Save per stack, stacks 3 times. On Crit: 1d6 Wisdom Damage. On Vorpal: 1 stack of Vulnerability An item can have only one temporary item enhancement at a time.

Spell.Name: Greater Voidmind Poison Imbue
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Coat your weapon in a magical poison that saps the defenses from your enemies on contact. On Hit: -1 Spell Resistance per stack, stacks 3 times. On Crit: 1d6 Intelligence Damage. On Vorpal: 1 stack of Vulnerability An item can have only one temporary item enhancement at a time.

Spell.Name: Spill the Bad Stuff
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Gildleaf Deals 1d6+4 per Caster Level of a random type of damage to enemies in a short cone. The damage all scales with Positive Spell Power. Affected enemies have a chance to be Blinded, Dazed, Silenced, Tripped, Stunned, or Paralyzed. (Fortitude save negates).

Spell.Name: Wave of Poison
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Ceruleite You infect enemies in a short cone with a deadly poison that eats away at them. Affected enemies take 2d4 Poison damage plus 1 Poison damage per 2 Caster Levels every 2 seconds for 12 seconds. This poison will leave enemies Contaminated. (Max Caster Level: 10) Poison-immune enemies to become vulnerable to Poison for 12 seconds.

Spell.Name: Greater Wave of Poison
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Ceruleite You infect enemies in a short cone with a deadly poison that eats away at them. Affected enemies take 2d6 Poison damage plus 1 Poison damage per Caster Level every 2 seconds for 16 seconds. This poison will leave enemies Contaminated. (Max Caster Level: 20) Poison-immune enemies to become vulnerable to Poison for 12 seconds.

Spell.Name: Venom Vial
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Conjuring a bottle of magical poison, you throw a projectile at a single foe that deals 3 to 8 Poison damage per caster level, max caster level 10. This poison will leave the enemy Contaminated. DND Dice: Deals 1d6+2 Poison damage per caster level, max 10d6+20

Spell.Name: Caustic Obliteration
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Throw a vial that explodes with acid on impact, dealing 1d6+3 Acid damage per Caster Level to all enemies nearby. (Max Caster Level 10)

Spell.Name: Fiery Obliteration
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Throw a vial that explodes with fire on impact, dealing 1d6+3 Fire damage per Caster Level to all enemies nearby. (Max Caster Level 10)

Spell.Name: Frost Obliteration
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Throw a vial that explodes with frost on impact, dealing 1d6+3 Cold damage per Caster Level to all enemies nearby. (Max Caster Level 10)

Spell.Name: Poison Obliteration
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Throw a vial that explodes with poison on impact, dealing 1d6+3 Poison damage per Caster Level to all enemies nearby. (Max Caster Level 10)

Spell.Name: Voltaic Obliteration
Spell.Description: Primer Element: Crimsonite Throw a vial that explodes with electricity on impact, dealing 1d6+3 Electric damage per Caster Level to all enemies nearby. (Max Caster Level 10)

Spell.Name: Reborn in Fire
Spell.Description: A swirl of fire surrounds you dealing 1d6 fire damage per character level to enemies and healing allies for 1d3 per character level. This consumes all Primal Charges, and both the damage and healing are increased by 25% per Primal Charge. If 3 or more Primal Charges are consumed, the bonus damage and healing are doubled and you gain Dancing Flame for 6 seconds.

Spell.Name: Shard Storm
Spell.Description: Summons a cloud of acidic poisonous shards that randomly strikes enemies within 15 meters. 6 strikes over 6 seconds. Each shard deals 1d3 poison and acid damage per character level. This consumes all Primal Charges, and the damage of each shard is increased by 25% per Primal Charge. If 3 or more Primal Charges are consumed, the bonus damage is doubled, and you gain Shard Deflection for 12 seconds.

Spell.Name: Thunder Snow
Spell.Description: Sends forth a wide wave of freezing hail before you with a narrow blast of lightning at its center directly in front of the caster. The hail deals 1d6 cold damage per character level, Fortitude save for half (DC: 20 + Evocation Bonuses + Highest Mental Ability Score Modifier). The bolt of lightning strikes for 1d6 per character level. Reflex save for half. This consumes all Primal Charges, and damage of both the hail and lightning are increased by 25% per Primal Charge. If 3 or more Primal Charges are consumed, enemies caught within are slowed by 70%.

DC.Name: Thunder Snow
DC.Description: Sends forth a wide wave of freezing hail before you with a narrow blast of lightning at its center directly in front of the caster. The hail deals 1d6 cold damage per character level, Fortitude save for half (DC: 20 + Evocation Bonuses + Highest Mental Ability Score Modifier).

Spell.Name: Misty Step
Spell.Description: You are able to leap through the air to bring the fight to your enemies or traverse chasms that make normal adventurers balk, but you disappear.

Spell.Name: Weird
Spell.Description: A targeted foe and all nearby enemies are subject to a Phantasmal Killer effect, with a DC20 + highest of INT/WIS/CHA modifier + Illusion spell bonuses to prevent the death.

Spell.Name: Gloomspear
Spell.Description:
Epic Strike: Single-target SLA, 1d6+6 Negative Damage per caster level and applies 3 stacks of Shattermantle. Cooldown 6 seconds, cost 5 Spell Points
Every Epic Strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

Spell.Name: Moon Lance
Spell.Description:
Epic Strike: Single-target SLA, 1d6+6 Cold Damage per caster level and applies 3 stacks of Shattermantle. Cooldown 6 seconds, cost 5 Spell Points
Every Epic Strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

Spell.Name: Cold Light of the Moon
Spell.Description: Creates a lingering Area of Effect of moonlight. Deals 3d6 Cold Damage plus 2 per Caster Level to enemies inside the zone every 2 seconds. The zone lasts for 10 seconds. 25 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Dark Light of the Moon
Spell.Description: Creates a lingering Area of Effect of moonlight. Deals 3d6 Negative Damage plus 2 per Caster Level. to non-undead enemies inside the zone every 2 seconds The zone lasts for 10 seconds. 25 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Moon's Shadow
Spell.Description: Necromancy SLA. Hit target enemy with a miniature black hole for 1d6+28 Negative damage per caster level. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half. Cooldown 18 seconds, cost 40 Spell Points.

Spell.Name: Zero Degree Comet
Spell.Description: Evocation SLA. Hit target enemy with a falling chunk of ice for 1d6+28 Cold damage per caster level. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half. Cooldown 18 seconds, costs 40 Spell Points.

Spell.Name: Flame Pillar
Spell.Description:
Epic Strike: Bring a pillar of fire down on a single enemy, dealing 1d6+6 Fire damage per caster level. Cooldown 6 seconds, cost 5 Spell Points
Every Epic Strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

Spell.Name: Healing Pillar
Spell.Description:
Epic Strike: Bring a pillar of positive energy down on a single ally, healing them for 3d6+6 Hit Points, plus an additional 1 per Caster Level (Max Caster Level: 15). This is a Conjuration spell, and counts as both a Positive and Cure Wounds spell. Can be used on Undead enemies, who take that Positive healing as damage. Cooldown 6 seconds, cost 5 Spell Points
Every Epic Strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

Spell.Name: Sun Pillar
Spell.Description:
Epic Strike: Bring a beam of light down on a single enemy, dealing 1d6+6 Light damage per caster level. Cooldown 6 seconds, cost 5 Spell Points.
Every Epic Strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

Spell.Name: Chain Cure
Spell.Description: A powerful discharge of Positive energy strikes a primary Ally or Undead Foe for 1d6+3 Positive Healing per Caster Level and then arcs to other nearby Allies and Undead Foes hitting each of them with a similar bolt of Positive energy. (Max Caster Level: 20). This is considered a Cure Wounds spell. (Available Metamagics: Empower, Empower Healing, Maximize, Quicken, Enlarge, and Intensify) Cooldown 9 seconds

Spell.Name: Holy Fireball
Spell.Description: Creates a ball of fire that detonates on impact, causing an explosion of light and flame that deals 1d3+9 Light damage and 1d3+9 Fire damage per caster level to targets in its path. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half. This counts as both a Fire and Light spell. (Max Caster Level: 20). (Available Metamagics: Empower Maximize Quicken Enlarge Intensify Embolden) Cooldown 9 seconds

Spell.Name: Thorn Strike
Spell.Description: You hurl a magical thorn at your target dealing 5 to 7 points of Piercing damage per caster level (up to a maximum of 50 to 70 damage at caster level 10).

Spell.Name: Thorn Bloom
Spell.Description: Thorns blast out from your body inflicting 5 to 10 points of Piercing damage per caster level (up to a maximum of 50 to 100 damage at caster level 10) to all nearby foes. Reflex save for half.

Spell.Name: Plant Growth
Spell.Description: Grants a Plant a +4 size bonus to Strength, a +4 Size Bonus to Constitution, and a -2 penalty to Dexterity.

Spell.Name: Thorn Blade
Spell.Description: Summons a Scimitar of Blight that does a mix of Acid and Posion damage instead of slashing damage, and uses the wielder's Wisdom instead of Strength for determining attack and damage bonuses. the user can choose to summon one-handed or two-handed versions, and the swords are automatically equipped when created. At caster level 1, it has a +1 enhancement bonus and the acid/poison effect. Every five caster levels the summoned swords improve. Because they are an extension of the caster's will, monks may use these weapons without becoming uncentered. The Thorn blade is not a physical weapon, but rather pure liquid shaped by the caster;s will; because of this, it dissolves when unequipped.

Spell.Name: Thorn Wave
Spell.Description: You hurl a wave of magical thorns in front of you dealing to all targets in front of you 6 to 11 points of Piercing damage per caster level (up to a maximum of 90 to 165 damage at caster level 15). Reflex save for half.

Spell.Name: Grasping Thorns
Spell.Description: Powerful thorny vines rip out of the ground seizing all enemies in the area. Enemies save vs Reflex or become entangled, with a reoccuring Strength save to break free. Targets also take 1d6 in piercing damage every 2 seconds. All enemy movement through the area is slowed by 30%, no save. Area of effect spells will destroy these vines and free any entangled creatures. Incorporeal creatures and oozes are naturally immune. Fire elementals and other fire creatures are immune because they burn through the plants.

Spell.Name: Thorn Lance
Spell.Description: You hurl a great thorn lance at your target dealing 9 to 14 points of piercing damage per caster level (up to a maximum of 180 to 280 damage at caster level 20). The lance will damage all enemies in front or behind the target.

Spell.Name: Blighted Charge
Spell.Description:
You leap forward with the speed and ferocity spewing blight around you as you pass. You attack enemies in your path, dealing an extra 5[W], with a +1 bonus to critical threat and multiplier, and targets caught in your wake are Blinded and Helpless for 8 seconds. A successful reflex save negates this effect.
For 10 seconds after the charge you gain +3 Imbue Dice.
Stun vs Reflex DC: 10 + Druid Level + Highest if Wis/Dex/Str + Necromancy bonuses.

Spell.Name: Jaws of Doom
Spell.Description:
Valid Forms: Plague Wolf, Blighted Wolf. As your jaws close over your enemies, they feel their life end. This attack deals an extra 10[W], +1 bonus to critical threat and multiplier, and your foe must save vs Fortitude or dies as if slayed by a vorpal weapon (Does not affect oozes, Undead, Constructs or Elementals).
Death vs Fortitude DC: 10 + Druid Level + Highest of Wis/Dex/Str + Necromancy bonuses.

Spell.Name: Blighted Bite
Spell.Description: This spell enhances the power of the Biting Acid or Biting Poison Imbues by 3 Imbue dice. This spell can be used in any wolf form.

Spell.Name: Blighted Breath
Spell.Description: Valid Forms: Plague Wolf, Blight Wolf. Sends out a breath of poisonous gas a frontal cone dealing 3 to 10 points of Poison damage per caster level (up to a maximumm of 30 to 150 damage at caster level 15) with a Reflex save for half damage. They must also make a Fortitude save or be Blinded for 10 seconds. If you are using the Biting Acid Imbue this damage is converted into 3 to 8 Acid damage per caster level (up to a maximum of 30 to 120 damage at caster level 15).
